attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A reduction in demand in the economy is seen by leaders preferring to collect real estate and glittery chattels rather than giving the people any direction - say 'up up and away'.
Demand should be boosted by the examples of our leaders to go at least to low Earth orbit to encourage us further

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
